course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Structured Products
course.description: Financial instruments and derivatives markets; Structured solutions including payoff design / packaging / distribution / pricing / hedging / funding; The popular structures in practice across the asset classes (Equity, Funds, FX, Interest Rate, Credit and Commodities); The customized index business based on factors, portfolio theory and other trading models with up-to-date industry practices; Computational methods for derivatives and structured products, including binomial tree methods, Monte Carlo simulation.
